name: browserfs

scripts.build: npm-run-all --parallel build:tsc build:scripts --sequential build:rollup --parallel build:webpack build:webpack-release
scripts.docs: typedoc --mode file --out doc --excludePrivate --readme src/DOCS.md --name BrowserFS src
scripts.test:prepare: npm-run-all build:scripts script:make_fixture_loader script:make_test_launcher test:build script:make_zip_fixtures script:make_xhrfs_index
scripts.watch: npm-run-all build --parallel watch:tsc watch:scripts watch:rollup watch:webpack watch:webpack-release
